scripts.watch: nodemon loader/server.js --watch output/Server*/**/* --watch output/Shared*/**/* & webpack --watch --progress --config webpack.development.config.js
scripts.build-production-client: rm -rf dist && rm -rf output && spago build -p production/Environment.purs --purs-args '--codegen corefn,js' && zephyr Client.IM.Main Client.Experiments.Main Client.Recover.Main Client.Settings.Main Client.InternalHelp.Main Client.Help.Main Client.Leaderboard.Main Client.Profile.Main Client.Login.Main Client.Landing.Main && rm -rf output && mv dce-output output && webpack --progress --config webpack.production.config.js
scripts.production-server: git pull --no-edit && npm install && spago build -p production/Environment.purs && pm2 restart server --update-env
